answerText: laser cooling [or Doppler cooling][10]  Laser cooling of atoms can be used to construct extremely precise examples of this device, which often rely on the electronic transition of cesium. NIST-F1 is the one used by the federal government.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 10 | 8 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The width of atomic transitions limits the effectiveness of this technique to h-bar times linewidth over two times Boltzmann's constant. For 10 points each: [10] Name this method in which atoms travelling in a direction opposed to a beam of photons see an increase in frequency and consequently lose momentum and energy.
